name: tm50
effect: Teaches Overheat to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Overheat to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Nightmare Gen I: Substitute)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user attacks the foe at full power using fiery energy. It also sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk.
flavor_text.platinum: The user attacks the foe at full power using fiery energy. It also sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user attacks the foe at full power using fiery energy. It also sharply reduces the user’s Sp. Atk.
